name: Handpicked Media
description:
Handpicked Future is a partnership between Future Plc and Handpicked Media. Future plc is an international media group and leading digital business, listed on the London Stock Exchange (symbol: FUTR). Future has operations in the UK, US and Australia creating more than 200 publications, apps, websites and events.
Handpicked Media is a marketing agency for over 500 independent digital publishers with channels across a range of sectors including lifestyle, fashion, beauty, entertainment, food and parenting, set up in 2009 by Krista Madden. Marry this with Future Plc’s digital and content creation capabilities, and you have a very different proposition that offers brands a unique opportunity to reach influential and engaged audiences via bespoke content marketing solutions.
